headline: Freeport Announces Third-Quarter 2025 Reporting Schedule and Conference Call Plans
summary: PHOENIX, October 10, 2025--Freeport (NYSE: FCX) today announced that it plans to hold a conference call with analysts and investors in November 2025, to provide a report on the investigation of the September 8, 2025, mud rush incident at the Grasberg Block Cave and present FCX’s multi-year operational and financial outlook, including for PT Freeport Indonesia (PTFI). FCX and PTFI are advancing the investigation, damage assessments and the development of future operating plans. The date of the No

headline: How Recent Setbacks and Market Shifts Are Changing the Narrative for Freeport-McMoRan
summary: Freeport-McMoRan's stock narrative has shifted recently, as the consensus analyst price target dropped from $50.06 to $46.59. This indicates a reassessment of the company's fair value. This adjustment comes amid split analyst sentiment, with some citing operational setbacks at key mines, while others focus on supportive commodity market dynamics. Stay tuned to find out how you can monitor these evolving views and keep up with the latest updates on Freeport-McMoRan's outlook. What Wall Street...
